name: Loop Runner (BigMaexle)
description:
CONTROLS: 

UP or w: jump

DOWN or s: slide

So this is my entry for the Black and White Jam No.8 with the the theme "loop". It is a very basic gameloop. But I think it is actually a little bit fun and i hope you are enjoying it as well. btw: Developer's Highscore is 27 ;). 

Programming/Artwork/Music/sfx all by myself. 

font is "dotty" by Kevin Richey: https://www.1001fonts.com/dotty-font.html

Created with the Love2D Framework.
